test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationLT-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationLT-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'lt' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationLT-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationLT-3 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'lt' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationLT-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationLT-6 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of 'le' for xs:dayTimeDuration, evaluating to false. *******************************************************

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-001
test-case.description: test comparison of dayTimeDurations
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; not(local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) lt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-002
test-case.description: test comparison of dayTimeDurations
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; not(local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-003
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; exists(local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:true()) lt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-004
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:false()) lt xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D")

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-005
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; exists(local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:true()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"))

test-case.name: cbcl-dayTimeDuration-less-than-006
test-case.description: test comparison of xs:dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($dayTimeDuration as xs:dayTimeDuration, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $dayTimeDuration }; local:dayTimeDuration(xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D"), fn:false()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-001
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(false()) le xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-002
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) le xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-003
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-004
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(true()) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D")

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-005
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") le local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-006
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") le local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-007
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") le local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-008
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") le local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-009
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(false()) le local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-010
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) le local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-011
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) le local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-value-less-equal-012
test-case.description: Test behaviour of the overloaded less equal value comparison operator when presented with an expression with static type xs:duration.
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) le local:f(true())
